Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class VehiclesController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.VehiclesController
@Controller public class VehiclesController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with Vehicles.
Since:
2/1/2022
Author:
Logan Kirkwood llk1005@sru.edu

    • deleteVehicle

      @GetMapping("/deletevehicles/{id}") public String deleteVehicle(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Finds a vehicle using the id parameter and if found, redirects to confirmation page If there are dependency issues, the vehicle is not deleted and an error is displayed to the user.
      Parameters:
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /delete/deletevehicleconfirm

      @GetMapping("/deletevehicleconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteVehicleConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)

      Parameters:
      id - of the vehicle being deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Returns:
      redirects to /vehicles

      @PostMapping("edit-vehicles/{id}") public String vehicleUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, Vehicles vehicle, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives the new vehicles object and passes it off to be validated Once valid the object is saved to the vehicles repository

      id - of the vehicle being edited
      vehicle - holds the new vehicle object submitted by the user
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects to /vehicles or /edit/edit-vehicles

      Parameters:
      shipmentId - holds the id of the shipment being assigned
      Returns:
      minKey
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException

      @PostMapping("submit-add-vehicle") public String vehicleAddForm(@ModelAttribute("vehicleForm") Vehicles vehicle, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives a vehicle object by the user and passes it off for validation Once valid it is saved to the vehicles repository

      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
